Bloomberg News reported Thursday that the bonuses would average$ 10,000 for 10,755 salaried workers, but some who aren't covered by government pay restrictions could get up to half their salary. Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne has said the workers deserve bonuses even though the company lost money because of work they did in revamping or redesigning 16 models since the 2009 bankruptcy.
